backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining the backend actor that stores leadership word submissions, counts aggregated words, and collects resilient leadership activities with query APIs for summaries and listings.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable report mapping implemented product features to frontend files, shared components, test requirements, and confidence levels for the Institution Hero app.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten high-level summaries of all major frontend files, documenting routing, pages, components, hooks, styling, and configuration for build and review purposes.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS base layer defining light and dark theme design tokens (colors, radius, charts, sidebar) and applying consistent background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that sets metadata, page title, root mount element, and loads the React application entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application entry configuring TanStack Router routes, wrapping all pages in a shared AppShell layout and ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Shared application layout with sticky header, navigation links, responsive mobile menu, branding, and Internet Identity–based authentication controls.
frontend/src/components/LeadershipWordPa: UI component that fetches aggregated leadership word counts and displays the top results as a ranked bar chart with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/MicroSolutionsCo: React component that fetches and displays community-submitted micro-solutions grouped by challenge type, with loading and empty states. It renders a scrollable list showing the challenge label, solution text, and associated protective factor.
frontend/src/components/PageSection.tsx: Layout wrapper component that renders children inside a responsive, centered section with consistent padding and max width. Accepts an optional className for customization.
frontend/src/components/SignInGate.tsx: Authentication guard component that blocks access to children unless the user is signed in via Internet Identity. Shows a sign-in prompt with status handling when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/content/proposalContent.ts: Static content module containing proposal metadata, author bio, abstracts, learning outcomes, and activity descriptions for the application. Used to populate pages and activities with research-based text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity using React Query. Automatically invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, identity persistence, and detailed login status flags. Wraps the app to expose identity state to all components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as leadership word counts and micro-solutions. All queries depend on the authenticated actor and handle cache invalidation on mutation success.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining light and dark theme color variables, typography, and base styles. Establishes the design system for backgrounds, cards, accents, and charts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app and wraps it with React Query and Internet Identity providers. Initializes global state management and authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/ActivitiesPage.tsx: Page component that introduces and links to two interactive leadership activities using proposal content. Displays activity goals and descriptions with navigation to the respective activity routes.
frontend/src/pages/Activity1LeadershipWo: Renders Activity 1 where signed-in users submit a single leadership word with reflections, validates input, submits via a mutation, and shows a thank-you state with community pattern summary.
frontend/src/pages/Activity2ResilientLea: Implements Activity 2 allowing users to submit a resilient leadership micro-solution tied to campus challenges, posts it via a mutation, and displays a community solutions list after submission.
frontend/src/pages/BioPage.tsx: Displays an author bio page using proposal content, including name, organization, biography text, and a brief international experience section.
Shows a list of learning outcomes pulled from proposal content, presented as styled cards within a shared page layout.
frontend/src/pages/OverviewPage.tsx: Provides a landing overview with hero banner, abstract content, and navigation links to activities, learning outcomes, and the session outline.
frontend/src/pages/ReferencesPage.tsx: Renders a references page listing research sources from proposal content in a simple card-based layout.
frontend/src/pages/SessionOutlinePage.ts: Displays the session timeline with total duration calculation, individual agenda items, and facilitation notes sourced from proposal content.
frontend/src/pages/TakeawaysPage.tsx: Presents key takeaways from the session, mapping proposal content into styled sections with titles and descriptions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with dark mode, content paths, custom theme extensions (colors, fonts, radii, animations), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the overall project state and roadmap for the “Institution Hero” app, including schema/versioning, a high-level summary, and a list of planned features. Captures requirements for core content pages, interactive leadership activities, authentication, session outline views, and visual theming based on the provided higher-education proposal.
